name: Caribbean Bites and West Indian Cuisine Restaurant & Bakery

reviews.text:
I was in the neighborhood visiting a friend and remembered there was a spot called East coast or west coast or something to that effect nearby.

Upon entering I was undecided about what I wanted to order but saw a gentleman ask for white pudding. I ended up ordering the white pudding, an eggball and a cheese roll. The server assured me that I wouldn‚Äôt be disappointed after I inquired about the taste. She definitely wasn‚Äôt lying. I felt like I was back home in Guyana.

No photos to post because the food disappeared before I could take a photo.

Outstanding service, exceptionally tasty and delicious food at an affordable price. From pastries to lunch items and dinner I‚Äôve enjoyed all the items bought. Would highly recommend this restaurant.
Excellent service and quality food! A must go to if in Bklyn!

I ordered here very often. Customer service. Excellent the food excellent very good. The pastries were very good. The salmon burger to die for and the curry Q that was amazing. Tasty spicy good I would recommend Caribbean bites to anybody.
Omg it was great,Kelly customer service was exceptional, again today......üòäüòäüòäüòä
Great spot. I had a roti with curry chicken and greens. Amazing value.
I love the food but it has gotten very expensive over the years
Great food and service, I enjoyed every bit of it made me feel at home ü•∞
The only place I can go to in NY and enjoy authentic Caribbean, particularly Guyanese food that reminds me of home. Staff were friendly and helpful.
